idea:
​
​TechShiksha is an Ed-Tech based Resources and Services company which was founded by IIT-Bombay Alumni.
We design STEAM (Science Technology Engineering Arts and Mathematics) based kits for children which are being used by schools and educators all around the country. Our Kits explore fundamentals of Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Astronomy,Engineering and Robotics in a Do It Yourself Approach.
We have been organizing workshops on Design and Innovation of Robotics since our incorporation. Children Participate in our design Challenges all around the country exhibiting their innovative skills and temperament towards DIY learning.
We have also been catering ATL Schools with our Products and provide training in Robotics and Coding to teachers.
Our DIY Robotics kit viz. WitBlox has been consistently Ranked #1 in amazon.in and is loved by both children and parents.​
name: WE TECHSHIKSHA LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
GoBisbo Broadcasting Networks Private Limited

We are storyteller of news, presented in animation. We publish current news and event in animation. The India Today and Time Magazine for the video generation. Present in 7 Indian languages with a total watch time of over 1 billion minutes on YouTube.

Bisbo won "Best Startup in Asia 2018" (www.superstartupsasia.com)

We are team of 47 and expect to double in FY 2021/22
name: GOBISBO BROADCASTING NETWORKS PRIVATE LIMITED
